title: Tyler1 build still good on Draven?
body: I know youmuu's doesn't give attack speed in its active anymore, but could the finished build still work well on Draven? If you don't know, it's something like this {{item:3142}} {{item:3139}} {{item:3006}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3036}} {{item:3031}} You could sometimes replace {{item:3036}} with{{item:3072}} if there is not too much armour on the enemy team, or you just need the lifesteal.

replies.body: No. Draven is getting changes on the PBE though to give him better damage with standard ADC builds
